meanings.sent1: I found matsutakes in the forest yesterday.

meanings.definition: Matsutakes: the plural form of matsutake, a type of mushroom
meanings.sent1: She bought a basket full of matsutakes from the market.
meanings.sent2: The matsutakes were expensive but worth every penny.

meanings.sent4: The matsutakes spread their earthy scent throughout the room.
meanings.sent5: The matsutakes added a delightful crunch to the salad.

meanings.definition: Matsutakes: belonging to or associated with matsutake mushrooms
meanings.sent1: The matsutakes season was eagerly awaited by mushroom enthusiasts.
meanings.sent2: She prepared a matsutakes stir-fry for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The matsutakes party was a fungi-filled affair.
